edu.worcester.cs499summer2012.adapter

Class TaskListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • edu.worcester.cs499summer2012.adapter.TaskListAdapter

  • public class TaskListAdapter
extends
    ListView adapter for the TaskList container. Enables tasks in a TaskList to be viewed in a ListView. Also allows for list sorting using task comparators.
    Author:
    Jonathan Hasenzahl

      • TaskListAdapter

        public TaskListAdapter(Activity activity,
               TaskList tasks)
        Default constructor. Creates a new TaskListAdapter containing a TaskList and assigned to an Activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity that owns this adapter
        tasks - the TaskList handled by this adapter
